bill.summary:
Donald Payne Sr. Colorectal Cancer Detention Act of 2016
This bill amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to provide for Medicare coverage and payment, subject to specified frequency limits, of certain colorectal cancer screening blood-based tests.
